com.defano.jmonet.canvas.paint

Class PaintFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.defano.jmonet.canvas.paint.PaintFactory

  • public class PaintFactory
extends Object
    A utility for producing Paint in commonly-needed colors and textures.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PaintFactory() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Paint makeCheckerboard(int checkSize)
      Produces a light-grey and white checkerboard paint pattern, often used as a canvas background to denote areas of an image that are transparent.
      static Paint makeCheckerboard(int checkSize, Color c1, Color c2)
      Produces a checkerboard paint pattern of specified size and color.
      static Paint makePanelColor()
      Produces Paint of the same background color of a JPanel for the current look and feel, or Color.WHITE if no such color is defined.
      static Paint makeTransparent()
      Produces Paint that's fully transparent (otherwise black).

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • makePanelColor

        public static Paint makePanelColor()
        Produces Paint of the same background color of a JPanel for the current look and feel, or Color.WHITE if no such color is defined.
        Returns:
        Paint matching the panel background color.

      • makeTransparent

        public static Paint makeTransparent()
        Produces Paint that's fully transparent (otherwise black).
        Returns:
        Fully transparent paint.

      • makeCheckerboard

        public static Paint makeCheckerboard(int checkSize)
        Produces a light-grey and white checkerboard paint pattern, often used as a canvas background to denote areas of an image that are transparent.
        Parameters:
        checkSize - The square dimension of the checks, in pixels.
        Returns:
        Checkerboard paint

      • makeCheckerboard

        public static Paint makeCheckerboard(int checkSize,
                                     Color c1,
                                     Color c2)
        Produces a checkerboard paint pattern of specified size and color.
        Parameters:
        checkSize - The square dimension of the checks, in pixels
        c1 - First check's color
        c2 - Second check's color
        Returns:
        Checkerboard paint
